Lift Model Procedure

Source: R/procedure_lift_model.R
lift.procedure.Rd

Procedure to Lift Models

lift.procedure(myseed, mydata, colnumbers.covariates, delta, conditional)

Arguments

myseed

seed to split the data set in 3 samples
mydata

select the data to be split in 3 samples
colnumbers.covariates

column numbers of predictors excluding w
delta

cost of intervention
conditional

whether the offer is conditional or not

Value

List containing seed (myseed), whether the offer is conditional or not (conditional), and cost of intervention (delta). Followed by data (train.data, valid.data and test.data), probability of churn (non-targeted r0 /targeted r1), expected margin (non-targeted m0 /targeted m1), and lift (rmlift) for respectively train for train, valid, and test samples.

  • myseed

  • conditional

  • delta

  • train.data

  • valid.data

  • test.data

  • r0.train

  • r0.valid

  • r0.test

  • r1.train

  • r1.valid

  • r1.test

  • m0.train

  • m0.valid

  • m0.test

  • m1.train

  • m1.valid

  • m1.test

  • rmlift.train

  • rmlift.valid

  • rmlift.test
